name: Touhou: Draconian Winter Wonderland
description: Reimu was lazing around her shrine for the 6th day in a row. The constant downpour of snow falling from the sky meant she had no visitors. Infuriated about how long this unnatural torrent had been going on, she heads to Scarlet Devil Mansion, a place with a strange concentration of the flurry, inorder to find out more and shut it down
